title: Text and Commentary
medium: Five-channel video (black and white, sound; 30 min.), weavings, drawings, and pictographic video notations
dimensions:
Sheet (6 Pictograms, each): 22 × 16" (55.9 × 40.6 cm)
Sheet (5 Drawings, each): 19 1/2 × 23" (49.5 × 58.4 cm)
Overall installation: dimensions variable
credits: Committee on Media and Performance Art Funds
